name: rclone
description: Rclone is a command-line program for syncing files and directories to cloud storage providers. It supports encryption, mounting, and advanced operations with a powerful CLI.

features.title: Real-Time Sync
features.description: Sync files across 40+ cloud storage providers including S3, Google Drive, and Dropbox

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Protect data with client-side encryption before uploading to cloud storage

features.title: Cloud Storage
features.description: Access cloud storage as a local filesystem using FUSE on Linux and macOS

features.title: File Upload
features.description: Limit upload and download speeds to avoid saturating your network connection

features.title: Sync Operations
features.description: Keep local and remote directories synchronized with bidirectional or one-way sync

features.title: Filtering Rules
features.description: Include or exclude files based on patterns, size, or modification time
